column4: <lightbright> Does anyone here get that synchronizing click ubuntu.org Failed!
yes I fixed it!  want the command?
type that and you will never be bothered with that message again
yeah it fixd it for me
i was just wondering what you did.   :)
if there is no directory /home  sudo mkdir /home   &  sudo mkdir /home/<username>   then sudo cp /etc/skel/* /home/<username>      last sudo chown <username>:<username> /home/<username> -R
thanks but what you said I could not understand :P  sorry, can you say it layman terms please?
run that command, replace every <username>  with his/her user name.
what command?  the one you sent me?
you think those commands will do the trick 100%? :)
